name: Boss
text: Welcome back from your two-week paws.

name: Boss
text: While you were gone, we assigned you to a new project.

name: Boss
text: I’ll email the details to you later,

name: Boss
text: but I just need you to get up to speed and report back on how the team’s doing.

name: Boss
text: Great! I trust you still remember where your desk is.
